name: Pass without Trace
description: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. For the duration, each creature you choose within 30 feet of you (including you) has a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can't be tracked except by magical means. A creature that receives this bonus leaves behind no tracks or traces.

components.materialDescription: ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce

effects.description: Chosen creatures within 30 ft gain +10 Stealth and cannot be tracked except by magic; leave no tracks.
